taxon_identification.taxon_hierarchy: family Polygonaceae;subfamily Eriogonoideae;genus Eriogonum;species tenellum;variety tenellum;

bio:treatment.discussion: Variety tenellum is common and widespread throughout its northern range in southeastern Colorado, New Mexico, western Oklahoma, and northern and western Texas. Outlying populations, extending northward from Mexico, enter the flora area in Dona Ana County, New Mexico, and Webb County, Texas.
